patthana18.23:1.1: Upādānaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.23:2.1: Kilesaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
